name: Heaven's Rule
description:
So...

I don't know whether to call this a demo, it's more like... a chunk. Taken from the middle of the story (if you feel a little lost while playing, that's why).

I wanted to make a game with RPG Maker to learn to use the engine, but overscoped the project by way too much, so I ended up just making a piece of the whole thing.

Still, I hope you enjoy it and can get some entertainment out of it!

I learned a lot, and hope to make something complete in the future!

Story

You play as Lucy, the only human to have ever gotten into Heaven.
But where are all the others? Do the angels know something you don't?

I added one secret! Can you find it?

Controls

- Arrow keys or left click (on specified area) to move
- Shift to sprint
- X to access menu and to exit
- Space bar to interact and continue dialogue

(I recommend saving before choosing a gem to take back to Hell!)
